::Feline:;

She was almost knocked out of her chair. She jumped up and exposed 
her claws. She looked him up and down for a moment. "You know, for a 
stunning bot like yourself, your quite rude. Do you alway shows those 
who are talking to your leader with such disrespect?" She saundered 
up to him but stayed back a few feet. "Well, if your not doing to 
introduce yourself, then allow me first. I'm Feline. And you are?" 
She knew this bot would be hostile, so she would have to use other 
measures.  She decided to try the slow approach.  She smiled sweetly 
at him and walked back to Zardus.  She stood next to him. She leaned 
down and whispered into his ear,"Is that the one you want me 
partnered up with? He's sweet, but I don't think he likes me." She 
said in a breathy voice.  She stood up and put her hand on Zardus' 
shoulder and purred.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> The Oblitercons/Punch:
> 
> 
> 
> Hiss, Scavenger, Breakdown, and Pyro stopped near the shields, 
defenses going 
> down long enough for them to enter the base, not even a millisecond 
later the 
> defenses powering back up to full.
> 
> The four Oblitercons entered the CR room, looking around at the 
seven CR 
> chambers.  Each got into one, grumbling about not getting to rip 
out any 
> Maximal sparks from their dirty Maximal bodies.
> 
> ----
> 
> Dark One flipped out of his CR chamber, landing on the ground 
evenly on both 
> mechanical feet.  Stretching, he yelled out.  
> 
> Using his internal scanning equipment to pinpoint an energy-
signature, Dark 
> One walked for a few cycles, seeing a large door to a room.  
Letting the door 
> slide open as his motion was detected, Dark One walked in.
> 
> Seeing Feline all over Zardus, Dark One smiled.  "Oh, you're busy.  
Well, 
> I'll talk now, not later."
> 
> Walking over to Zardus, Dark One pushed at Feline hard, attempting 
to knock 
> her back.
> 
> "Requesting orders."
